metadata.title: CVE-2023-1393 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
A flaw was found in X.Org Server Overlay Window. A Use-After-Free may leadto local privilege escalation. If a client explicitly destroys thecompositor overlay window (aka COW), the Xserver would leave a danglingpointer to that window in the CompScreen structure, which will trigger ause-after-free later.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-1393` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

xdmx - 2:1.19.6-1ubuntu4.15
xdmx-tools - 2:1.19.6-1ubuntu4.15
xmir - 2:1.19.6-1ubuntu4.15
xnest - 2:1.19.6-1ubuntu4.15
xorg-server-source - 2:1.19.6-1ubuntu4.15
xserver-common - 2:1.19.6-1ubuntu4.15
xserver-xephyr - 2:1.19.6-1ubuntu4.15
xserver-xorg-core - 2:1.19.6-1ubuntu4.15
xserver-xorg-legacy - 2:1.19.6-1ubuntu4.15
xserver-xorg-xmir - 2:1.19.6-1ubuntu4.15
xvfb - 2:1.19.6-1ubuntu4.15
xwayland - 2:1.19.6-1ubuntu4.15
No subscription required

xorg-server-source-hwe-18.04 - 2:1.20.8-2ubuntu2.2~18.04.11
xserver-xephyr-hwe-18.04 - 2:1.20.8-2ubuntu2.2~18.04.11
xserver-xorg-core-hwe-18.04 - 2:1.20.8-2ubuntu2.2~18.04.11
xserver-xorg-legacy-hwe-18.04 - 2:1.20.8-2ubuntu2.2~18.04.11
xwayland-hwe-18.04 - 2:1.20.8-2ubuntu2.2~18.04.11
No subscription required

criterions.comment: xorg-server package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:1.19.6-1ubuntu4.15').
xorg-server-hwe-18.04 package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:1.20.8-2ubuntu2.2~18.04.11').
tigervnc package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
